attributes.action: Indian students deported from UK should get refund of fees or call back to uk.
attributes.background: Students came to uk on student visa were mislead by government and department of education on course and extension criteria. Instead of taking action against agents, colleges and universities UK government deport them to hide the fraud of authority.

rejection.details: It's not clear what fees you mean, and whether you want the Government to refund this or the responsible institution.
